isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE
wtsproc.config: This guideline is for R & R of front and rear sections. It is not necessary to open the Air Conditioning or Power Steering system if equipped

step1.para: Chock wheels
Remove front bumper assembly
Open hood
Disconnect battery
Diconnect hood wiring harness and remove hood assembly.
Drain cooling system.
Remove right engine splash shield
Remove charge air cooler hoses and cap open ports.
Remove right side recirculation seal if applicable.
Remove or disconnect all coolant hoses necessary to remove radiator assembly with surge tank attached.
Disconnect A/C pressure transducer.
Disonnect A/C condenser assembly from radiatior assembly and secure out of way.
Disconnect fan hub air hose if applicable.
Disconnect ground strap from radiator.
Disconnect lower radiator stay rods.
Remove stone shield lower screws.
Remove upper frame cross member with grill attached
Remove lower frame cross member section and remove tow hooks.
Remove radiator assembly with surge tank attached.
Remove serpintine belt(s) and tensioner.
Remove fan blade, drive, pulley and hub.
Remove camshaft position sensor.
Remove alternator mounting bracket with alternator attached.
Remove crankshaft damper using puller.
Remove oil pump assembly including drift key.
Remove water pump pulley and pump assembly
Drain engine oil, remove oil pan, oil pick up tube and gaskets.
Remove front engine bracket bolts retaining bracket to cross member.
Position bottle jack to raise block and remove engine bracket

note.para: Position jack to allow for rotation of crankshaft.

step1.para: Disconnect power steering pump (or air compressor if equipped) from front cover.

note.para: Do not open power steering system.

step1.para: Remove front section of front cover.
Align timing gears. Check back lash and camshaft end play.

note.para: Replace any out of spec gears.

step1.para: Remove fuel lines from transfer pump and disconnect engine oil temperature sensor.
Disconnect injection pressure regulator (IPR) wiring.
Disconnect oil lines from high pressure oil pump and remove pump.
Remove upper and lower idler gears.
Remove camshaft timing plate.
Mark camshaft timing gear in relation to rear section of front cover. Rotate gear slightly to remove bolt through gear opening.

note.para: This step allows for camshaft gear puller clearance.

step1.para: Remove camshaft timing gear using puller.
Disconnect heater hose(s) from rear section of front cover.
Remove rear section of front cover assembly.
Clean all gasket and mating surfaces before installation.
Install gasket and rear section of front cover assembly and torque to spec.
Connect heater hose(s) to rear section of front cover.
With camshaft gear heated to 350 deg. Install cam gear. After cam gear cools off, reposition to original position as marked before removal.

note.para: Wear protective gloves when handling gear.

step1.para: Install upper and lower idler gears and torque to spec.
Install camshaft timing plate and torque to spec.
Install high pressure oil pump and connect oil lines to pump.
Connect injection pressure regulator (IPR) wiring.
Install fuel lines to transfer pump.
Install front section of front cover assembly and torque to spec.
Install front engine bracket to front cover/block and lower engine.
Install front engine bracket bolts retaining bracket to cross member.
Connect power steering pump (or air compressor if equipped) to front cover and torque to spec.

note.para: If equipped with air compressor, tighten compressor mounting bolts at front cover first, then at block and finally at rear of compressor to prevent damage.

step1.para: Install oil pick up tube and gasket and torque bolts to spec.
Install oil pan and torque to spec.
Replace front seal wear ring and install heating iron to crankshaft damper to prep for installation.
Install water pump assembly and pulley and torque to spec.
Replace front seal and install oil pump assembly including drift key and torque to spec.
Install heated crankshaft damper and torque to spec.

note.para: Wear protective gloves when handling damper.

step1.para: Install fan hub, pulley, drive and blade and torque to spec.
Install alternator mount bracket with alternator installed.
Install belt tensioner and belt(s)
Install fan hub line fitting if applicable.
Install camshaft position sensor.
Install radiator assembly with surge tank attached.
Connect lower radiator stay rods.
Install all coolant hoses necessary to complete installation.
Connect ground strap to radiator.
Connect fan hub air hose if applicable.
Connect condenser to radiator assembly, connect pressure transducer and install right recirculation seal if applicable.
Install lower and upper frame cross members and install tow hooks.
Install radiator stone guard grill screws to lower frame cross member.
Install charge air cooler hoses.
Fill engine oil and replace oil filter.
Fill cooling system.
Install hood assembly
Connect battery.
Install front bumper assembly.
Start engine. Check operation and check for leaks.
Top off all fluids.
Close hood and remove wheel chocks
